20110127000012.000|20110127000013.000|CC1|THE L.A.P.D. ARRIVED            
20110127000013.000|20110127000015.000|CC1|IMMEDIATELY, AS YOU CAN IMAGINE,
20110127000015.000|20110127000016.000|CC1|A HELICOPTER OVERHEAD AND CAME

20110127000658.000|20110127000659.000|CC1|SYLVIA: THANK YOU.

20110127000702.000|20110127000703.000|CC1|SENT THREE TEAMS TO THE HOSPITAL
20110127000703.000|20110127000704.000|CC1|IS NOT BEING BLAMED.            
20110127000704.000|20110127000706.000|CC1|IT HAPPENED AROUND 1230 IN      
20110127000706.000|20110127000707.000|CC1|ANAHEIM.                        
20110127000707.000|20110127000708.000|CC1|INVESTIGATORS SAY THE THREE
